meaningMnemonic: The <radical>insect</radical> that is amongst all the <radical>world</radical>'s <radical>tree</radical>s is the <kanji>butterfly</kanji>. They are always hanging around trees, those butterflies.
readingMnemonic: As you look at a <kanji>butterfly</kanji>, fluttering around a tree, a hand reaches out from the tree and grabs it, then starts plucking the wings off. An evil laugh comes from inside the tree, and you know it's Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう).
